metadata.package-name: German spelling dictionary for use with MarkLogic Server
metadata.description: This dictionary is based on the GNU Aspell 0.60 German (Deutsches) Dictionary Package by Kevin Atkinson, based on a word list by Bj√∂rn Jacke. See "sources" below for details. Greg Murray added XML tags to the word list to conform to the MarkLogic schema for spelling dictionaries.
